title: Counting Nodes in Smolyak Grids
abstract:
Using generating functions, we are proposing a unified approach to produce
explicit formulas, which count the number of nodes in Smolyak grids based on
various univariate quadrature or interpolation rules. Our approach yields, for
instance, a new formula for the cardinality of a Smolyak grid, which is based
on Chebyshev nodes of the first kind and it allows to recover certain
counting-formulas previously found by Bungartz-Griebel, Kaarnioja,
M\"uller-Gronbach, Novak-Ritter and Ullrich.
